esema sath purushaya gana penwana sathpurusha sutha්raye, yamek naraka siyak karaddi eka honda gunayak daka ema honda gunayata pa්rasansa karannath, naraka pilibandawa upeksha wennath haki nam eya sathpurushayage sath purusha gunayak bawath deshana karala thiyenawa.

eheth ramayanaya hudek nimiththak lesa salaka pasekata damiya haki mithyawak nowa, in eha giya sadhaka ee thulin hamuwima nisa thawath widwathun pirisak eya dakkhina peradiga ithihasaya namathi dwaraya wiwara karana yathurak bawata handunwathi.
dan thiyana labama durakathana ekkath ewa hamba wenawane.

thirana ganime balaya thibena aya mewa nodannawa wenna bahane.owun hithamatha manga harinawa wenna athi.ithama patu abhilashayan udesa jana jiwitha awadaname damanawa wenna athi.adhyana charika ehema yanne monawa balannadamata pena de thamayi dirghakalina salasumak nathiwa onna ohe karannan wale ho komis horakamata sitha wyapruthi salasum karana bawa.janathawa sawignyanaka naha.me aya chande denneth mokek hari thakkadi uurekuta.thamange iranama gana hari watahimak naha.me janathawata thiyenne dewi pihita thamayi.eeth okkotama kalin kowilath bimatama samathala welane.

padam kala yuththe keseda, wadagath wa...
